text: so you're the host for Thanksgiving this
year
lucky you hopefully you enjoy the role
of having dinner guests a well set table
doesn't require covering you can simply
use placemats but if you want to use a
tablecloth make sure it's generous
enough to fit even a bedsheet can work
in a pinch
not that one please forks on the Left
knives on the right the knife edge
should be facing the plate a custom that
dates back to medieval times when people
would bring their own knives to dinner
and it was a sharp weapon so the knife
faces in you don't want to injure any of
your guests most of them anyway
as for plates you don't need a separate
plate for bread a plate for salad and
whatever else one generous plate will do
don't worry about different kinds of
glasses for different drinks either even
for bubbly it's the champagne that makes
it fancy as for napkins as big as
possible and cloth please cloth a paper
napkin will tear apart and be a sticky
mess by the end of the meal you can
decorate your table in any style you
want just make sure is not so big that
it interferes with your guests eating or
conversing before the guests arrive
empty the dishwasher to make cleanup
easier and while you're at it empty a
coat closet or guests
better that your coats are piled on a
bed than theirs once everyone has
gathered at the table clink a glass
ask for quiet and thank your guests for
joining you of course there could be
disasters just let it go clean it up
quickly and deal with it later the whole
object is to entertain and make them
feel happy they are gathered together
good luck and have a Happy Thanksgiving
